mapper.sql: id, eid, did, jid, date, xcdycount, xcdyamount, hbcount, hbamount, ypamount, phamount, lpamount, zdamount, hwamount, qtamount, remarks, status,bccount,bcamount,total
mapper.select: select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from employee_fee t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from employee_fee t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select count(*) from employee_fee t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from employee_fee t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from employee_fee where eid=#{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from employee_fee t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id where t.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from employee_fee where did=#{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from employee_fee t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from employee_fee where eid=#{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname, de.id as deid,de.name as dename, jt.id as jtid,jt.name as jtname from employee_fee t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id left outer join dealerinfo de on t.did=de.id left outer join jobtype_dic jt on t.jid = jt.id where t.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.date <= #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.date >= #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=0 order by date desc
mapper.insert: insert into employee_fee (id, eid, did, jid, date, xcdycount, xcdyamount, hbcount, hbamount, ypamount, phamount, lpamount, zdamount, hwamount, qtamount, remarks, status,bccount,bcamount,total) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xcdycount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xcdyamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{hbcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hbamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ypamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{phamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lpamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{zdamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{hwamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{qtamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bccount,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{bcamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

mapper.update:
update employee_fee
eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jid = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
xcdycount = #{xcdycount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
xcdyamount = #{xcdyamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
hbcount = #{hbcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hbamount = #{hbamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ypamount = #{ypamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
phamount = #{phamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lpamount = #{lpamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
zdamount = #{zdamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
hwamount = #{hwamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
qtamount = #{qtamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bccount = #{bccount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bcamount = #{bcamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
total = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update employee_fee set eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, did = #{dealer.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jid = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xcdycount = #{xcdycount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, xcdyamount = #{xcdyamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, hbcount = #{hbcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hbamount = #{hbamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ypamount = #{ypamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, phamount = #{phamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lpamount = #{lpamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, zdamount = #{zdamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, hwamount = #{hwamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, qtamount = #{qtamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bccount = #{bccount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bcamount = #{bcamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
